headline: GTA Online
subtitle: This Week on the Podium
content:
Visit The Diamond Casino & Resort and give the Lucky Wheel a spin. You might walk away the owner of the Annis Euros, seen rotating on the podium adjacent, or youâ€™ll leave with GTA$, RP, clothing, accessories, snacks, or a mystery prize.

Discover the Lucky Wheel in The Diamond Casino & Resort lobby. If you win the top prize, your Podium Vehicle will be delivered to your selected Garage.
